Introduction
This topic contains information on awards involving dependents in receipt of education benefits, including
tracking education folders
providing notification of award actions to RPOs
, and
DIC payments to other payees following an election of education benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Notification and Award Actions for Dependents' Educational Assistance (DEA)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
